alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 2:24PM EST until March 03 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Martin County in southwestern Indiana... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Indiana... Southwestern Lawrence County in south central Indiana... Southeastern Daviess County in southwestern Indiana... * Until 300 PM EST. * At 223 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shoals to 12 miles east of Jasper, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Shoals and Indian Springs around 230 PM EST. Silverville and Williams around 235 PM EST. Owensburg around 240 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Mitchell, Tunnelton and Spring Mill State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
